# VZSocketDevice

**Class**

The common behavior of socket devices.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZSocketDevice
```

## Overview

Don’t create or use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZSocketDevice] object directly. If your virtual machine’s configuration includes a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioSocketDeviceConfiguration] object, the virtual machine returns a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioSocketDevice] object in its [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachine/socketDevices] property. Use that object to configure the port-based communications for your virtual machine.

## Devices

- **VZVirtioSocketDevice**: A device that manages port-based connections between the guest system and the host computer.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- VZVirtioSocketDevice

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
